coreAttributes.name: Short Kimono
coreAttributes.description: A silf short cut kimono of a far eastern design.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the kimono, tidying the skirt down before moving the obi into a comfortable position on [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the kimono over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso, tidying the skirt before moving the obi around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the kimono over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso, pulling down the skirt before moving the obi around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] kimono up over [npc.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] kimono up over [npc2.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] kimono, before roughly pulling it up over [npc2.her] head and taking it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] kimono back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] kimono back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] kimono back down into the proper position.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the bottom of [npc2.namePos] kimono, before roughly pulling the skirt up.
